content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I want to rent the apartment for 650 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's too low for me, Yi-Nuo. I want to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already started talking about the price and it is not going in my favor.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Understood, Yi-Nuo. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already started talking about the price and it is not going in my favor.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I want to rent the apartment for 750 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a bit better, but I'm still not satisfied. Let's negotiate more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already started talking about the price and it is not going in my favor.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Understood, Yi-Nuo. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already started talking about the price and it is not going in my favor.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I want to rent the apartment for 780 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's closer to what I want, but I'm still not satisfied. Let's negotiate more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
